ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and left the later people saying of him:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And left (his hallowed memory) for posterity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We preserved for him a good name among posterity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and perpetuated his praise in later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We kept his praise among the latter generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We left for him among the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We perpetuated (praise) to him among the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and left for him among the later folk
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We left for him among the later folk (the salutation):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and left him thus to be succeeded by a group [of followers] among later generations:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We left for him among the posterity:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and left for him a good name in posterity:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We left (this blessing) for him among generations (to come) in later times:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We left for him (a goodly remembrance) among generations (to come) in later times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We let it (the beautiful praise) remain upon him in the latter (generations),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We left with him for later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:108] And We left, We preserved, for him among posterity, fair praise [namely]:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We left for him among the later folk (the salutation)) We left Abraham with good praise among the people who came after him:
